input.sentences: the gardens are full of unexpected things .
there is even a water feature .
the flowers sometimes threaten to overtake the path .
there are even flowers in the pond !
all of the colors of the rainbow are represented .
output.sentences: There once was a beautiful water garden.
It features many sorts of flowers and greenery all around.
There were many types of flowers.
There were also aquatic plants that were striking.
The flowers were in many attractive colors that many liked.
